custom.title: Load custom script / characters
custom.introStart: To play with a custom script, you need to select the characters you want to play with in the official
custom.introEnd: and then upload the generated "custom-list.json" either directly here or provide a URL to such a hosted JSON file.
custom.instructionsStart: To play with custom characters, please read
custom.instructionsEnd: on how to write a custom character definition file.
custom.warning: Only load custom JSON files from sources that you trust!

nightOrder.title: Night Order
nightOrder.minionInfoDescription: • If more than one Minion, they all make eye contact with each other. • Show the “This is the Demon” card. Point to the Demon.
nightOrder.demonInfoDescription: • Show the “These are your minions” card. Point to each Minion. • Show the “These characters are not in play” card. Show 3 character tokens of good characters not in play.
